definition: the river of love/a stumbling block on the path to enlightenment (Buddhism)
to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)

sentences.english: You make me wanna love, you make me wanna fall.
sentences.chinese: 你让我陷入爱河，时欢时喜。

sentences.english: Falling in love is the paradigmatic example of  an involuntary  life-affecting desire.
sentences.chinese: 坠入爱河是一个欲望不由自主影响人生的经典案例。

sentences.english: Small-town girl meets mysterious drifter boy, they fall in love.
sentences.chinese: 小镇的女孩，男孩遇到神秘流浪汉，他们坠入爱河。

sentences.english: Roses never, never fall in lov.
sentences.chinese: 玫瑰们从来从来，都不会坠入爱河。

sentences.english: A man and a woman are tenderly making love in a one star hotel room.
sentences.chinese: 一对情人正在一家一星级酒店里共沐爱河。

sentences.english: I have always been intrigued about the phrases “falling in love” and “falling head over heels” in love.
sentences.chinese: 我一直好奇“坠入爱河”和“堕入情网”等相关短语。

sentences.english: At the touch of love everyone besa poet.
sentences.chinese: 每个洗澡在爱河中的人都是诗人。

sentences.english: People who are in love are happy people.
sentences.chinese: 沉浸爱河的人们总是幸福的人儿。

sentences.english: In the duration of a thunderclap in one place, two people could fall in love in another.
sentences.chinese: 甲处一声霹雳响过，乙处一双男女堕入了爱河。

sentences.english: At the touch of love everyone becomes a poet.
sentences.chinese: 赃羜每一个沐浴在爱河中的人都是诗人。

sentences.english: Let's slow it down so we fall in love…Ohhh.
sentences.chinese: 让我们放慢节奏，一起坠入爱河，噢。

sentences.english: Soon they fell in love, and were betrothed to be married.
sentences.chinese: 他们很快坠入了爱河，不久就订了婚。

sentences.english: From those first moments in Rome we were always madly and powerfully in love.
sentences.chinese: 从在罗马的那时起，我们疯狂地深陷爱河。

sentences.english: After meeting Maisie, 77, he grew even happier and fell deeply in love.
sentences.chinese: 在遇见77岁的梅齐后，他甚是幸福并进入爱河。

sentences.english: I hear you've fallen in love.
sentences.chinese: 我听闻你已堕入爱河了。

definition: to fall head over heels in love/to be passionately in love
in love with/to feel deeply attached to
to have an affinity with each other (idiom)/to find each other congenial
the pleasure of close intimacy in a couple (idiom)/sexual intercourse
stuck together as by glue (of lovers)/joined at the hip
(romantic) love/CL:個|个[ge4],場|场[chang3]/in love/to have an affair
